translations: 聪明的；脑筋好的；有头脑的

sentences.sentence: Lots of brainy female graduates enter the job market each year.
sentences.translation: 每年都有很多聪明的女毕业生进入就业市场。

sentences.sentence: Very brainy people generally do their most innovative work before they are 40.
sentences.translation: 非常聪明的人通常是在40岁之前从事他们最创新的工作。
